page.title: 17Tourism - Popular walks.
page.content: In recent years the local Water Authority has opened-up the areas around reservoirs to walkers and other visitors. Car parks have been provided in a number of places but as yet no water sports are allowed. One particular popular walk is around Digley and Bilberry Reservoirs. The car park here is situated in an old quarry. Picinc tables and litter bins have been provided and a very good path around the reservoirs has been improved in places. A comparativley new problem of concern to the local police is the number of thefts from parked cars. This has increased in recent times as the number of visitors to this area has increased. The car park at Digley has been a particular focus for such thefts and the police have been watching this parking area closely.
